title: Shenmue 3 may sacrifice shiny graphics for the sake of story
text:
Shenmue 3 may sacrifice shiny graphics for the sake of story 
Published By: Lazygamer.net - Today 
In an interview, Shenmue Directir Yu Suzuki said he could do with more money, especially if he's to make the game look good grpahically....
